医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
完美之路：深入研究质量管理的持续改进这次采访探讨了持续改进的原则以及如何应用它们来增强质量管理体系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/The-path-to-perfection-A-deep-dive-into-continuous-improvement-in-quality-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/The-path-to-perfection-A-deep-dive-into-continuous-improvement-in-quality-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=119d563d-565b-4030-92da-d969f6156db2 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 06:07:00 -0400 The path to perfection: A deep dive into continuous improvement in quality management
感人的信息：触觉表情符号如何增强在线社交支持数字通信过程中触摸的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Touching-Messages-How-tactile-emoticons-enhance-online-social-support.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Touching-Messages-How-tactile-emoticons-enhance-online-social-support.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33881fb3-b997-441b-a620-a0db68bf8374 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 06:01:00 -0400 Touching Messages: How tactile emoticons enhance online social support
ChatGPT 可以帮助患者进行良性前列腺肥大教育吗？ ChatGPT 对指示良性前列腺肥大的男性下尿路症状反应的准确性和质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Can-ChatGPT-aid-in-patent-education-for-benign-prostate-enlargement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Can-ChatGPT-aid-in-patent-education-for-benign-prostate-enlargement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68ed38c5-9d54-4e2d-9078-2f48853042d2 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 05:02:00 -0400 Can ChatGPT aid in patient education for benign prostate enlargement?
新研究发现，在家进行抗体测试可能会提高 COVID-19 的加强率基于侧向层析 (LFA) 的抗体测试用于检测 COVID-19 免疫力不足的可行性和优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/At-home-antibody-tests-could-drive-higher-COVID-19-booster-rates-new-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/At-home-antibody-tests-could-drive-higher-COVID-19-booster-rates-new-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a01cf49a-7bb8-4be6-8b10-6d952a08ea92 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 04:25:00 -0400 At-home antibody tests could drive higher COVID-19 booster rates, new research finds
虚拟现实如何改变女性的劳动经历PLOS ONE 的一项研究发现，虚拟现实 (VR) 可以有效减轻分娩疼痛和焦虑，为女性提供积极、身临其境的分娩体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/How-virtual-reality-transforms-womene28099s-labor-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/How-virtual-reality-transforms-womene28099s-labor-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08493e4d-bdb1-4c60-a120-487615412ad2 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 00:12:00 -0400 How virtual reality transforms women’s labor experiences
我们是否使用更多的糖替代品？废水分析揭示了瑞典城市的趋势国际环境组织的一项研究利用废水分析来追踪 COVID-19 大流行期间瑞典五个社区的人造甜味剂使用情况，发现消费水平没有重大健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Are-we-using-more-sugar-substitutes-Wastewater-analysis-reveals-trends-in-Swedish-cities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Are-we-using-more-sugar-substitutes-Wastewater-analysis-reveals-trends-in-Swedish-cities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a939fa44-243e-4fb3-8d36-e1b7c7a22939 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Are we using more sugar substitutes? Wastewater analysis reveals trends in Swedish cities
全球 Omega-3 指数地图更新揭示了持续存在的数据缺口和低水平《脂质研究进展》中的一项研究更新了全球 Omega-3 指数图，揭示了一些地区的改善，但强调了许多国家的显着数据差距和低水平，强调了全球干预的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Global-Omega-3-Index-map-update-reveals-persistent-data-gaps-and-low-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Global-Omega-3-Index-map-update-reveals-persistent-data-gaps-and-low-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=816df4bc-8003-4fcd-aba3-901de75f1444 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Global Omega-3 Index map update reveals persistent data gaps and low levels
肠道微生物组中的硫代谢物与神经退行性疾病之间的新联系被揭示神经退行性疾病 (NDD) 尚无已知的治疗方法且病因难以捉摸，会对大脑和神经系统造成不可逆转的损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-link- Between-sulfur-metabolites-in-gut-microbiome-and-neurodogenic-diseases-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/New-link- Between-sulfur-metabolites-in-gut-microbiome-and-neurodogenic-diseases-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d182a09b-7b1c-4a86-a001-a96fa000c1b2 Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:23:24 -0400 New link between sulfur metabolites in gut microbiome and neurodegenerative diseases revealed
昆士兰大学启动管理工作与生活平衡和工作压力恢复的研究昆士兰大学的研究人员需要参与者进行一项研究，以帮助了解人们如何平衡工作与生活并从日常工作压力中恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/UQ-launches-study-on-managing-work-life-balance-and-work-stress-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/UQ-launches-study-on-managing-work-life-balance-and-work-stress-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcb9723-ae9f-41df-8503-a36ef3146adc Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:18:00 -0400 UQ launches study on managing work-life balance and work stress recovery
研究揭示富含蛋白质的饮食对肠道微生物组和整体健康的影响新研究揭示了富含蛋白质的饮食对肠道微生物组和整体健康的影响。尽管西方饮食中蛋白质的摄入量不断增加，特别是运动员和肥胖者，但未消化的蛋白质的命运及其对人类健康的影响仍然很大程度上未知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-the-effects-of- Protein-rich-diets-on-the-gut-microbiome-and-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240616/Study-reveals-the-effects-of- Protein-rich-diets-on-the-gut-microbiome-and-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe6c82c-d132-44d9-86c0-7830632df03e Sun, 16 Jun 2024 23:17:23 -0400 Study reveals the effects of protein-rich diets on the gut microbiome and overall health
